properties.name: Clarion Inn Burnham
properties.description: Posted by Ginna1978 13015 Ferguson Valley Road, Burnham, PA, 17009The Clarion Inn is a nice hotel that has a decent bar and restaurant. There will be transportation provided to the guests from here to the ceremony/reception.

properties.name: Dragon fly Inn
properties.description: Posted by Ginna1978 rr1, Honey Grove, paThis is an amazing little B&B with 5 rooms and ambiance to spare! If you want to make a weekend of your trip to Central PA and take our picturesque area this is the place to stay. It is a bit farther from the ceremony/reception and you will have to provide your own transportation but well worth it in the end.

properties.name: Giant Food Store
properties.description: Posted by System  200 South Dorcas Street, Lewistown, PA, 17044Giant Food Store

properties.name: Giant Food Store
properties.description: Posted by System   325 West Freedom Avenue, Burnham, PA, 17009Giant Food Store

properties.name: Green Gables Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Ginna1978 900 South Main St, Lewistown, PA, 17044Green Gables Hotel is a newly renovated Inn, one of the closest to the ceremony/reception that we will transportation transportation.

properties.name: Lily Manor
properties.description: Posted by Ginna1978Hc 67, Mifflin, PA, 17058Lily Manor is where the ceremony/reception will be held. Below are the directions you will need to get there: 322 Traveling East or West to Mifflintown Exit - Route 35 head South on Route 35, 6.2 miles Lily Manor is brick mansion on right.

properties.name: Mom and Dad's House
properties.description: Posted by Ginna1978210 Cliffside drive, Lewistown, PAFeel free to call my parents at any time with anything you may need. 717-242-1998.

properties.name: Rose House Bed and Breakfast
properties.description: Posted by Ginna1978 617 Washington Ave, Mifflintown, PAThis is a cute little bed and breakfast providing 3 rooms. It is very close to the ceremony/reception although if you stay here you will be required to provide your own transportation.
